snippet.title: Hotel Renovator - OFFICIAL TRAILER 2
snippet.description:
Add us to wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1214470/Hotel_Renovator/

The new Hotel Renovator trailer is here, crafted especially for the Steam Next Fest!

Renovate your hotel just the way you like it. Choose between hundreds of items and accessories. Master the economy and take your hotel to new heights! 

Steam Next Festival is starting soon and we’re there with our Hotel Renovator demo! Starting on June 16th, you are going to be able to download the demo to your PC and play it for a good few days. If that’s not enough, we are preparing live streams of the Hotel Renovator demo, which will be running for the entire duration of the festival. Watch our Social Media and stay on top!


Add Hotel Renovator on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1214470/Hotel_Renovator/
Add Hotel Renovator Prologue on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1669140/Hotel_Renovator_Prologue/https://store.steampowered.com/app/1214470/Hotel_Renovator/
Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/PWgnH4EaVp
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TwoHorizons
